Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.datastax.driver.core.ProtocolOptions.NEWEST_SUPPORTED_PROTOCOL_VERSION
    This is provided for backward compatibility; use ProtocolVersion.NEWEST_SUPPORTED instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.deserialize(ByteBuffer)
    This method is provided for binary compatibility only. It is no longer supported, will be removed, and simply throws UnsupportedOperationException. Use DataType.deserialize(ByteBuffer, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.deserialize(ByteBuffer, int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use DataType.deserialize(ByteBuffer,ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.Host.getInitialReconnectionAttemptFuture()
    the suspicion mechanism has been disabled. This will always return a completed future.
    com.datastax.driver.core.PoolingOptions.getMaxSimultaneousRequestsPerConnectionThreshold(HostDistance)
    this method has been renamed to PoolingOptions.getNewConnectionThreshold(HostDistance). This method calls the new one internally, but you should use the new one in your code.
    com.datastax.driver.core.PoolingOptions.getMaxSimultaneousRequestsPerHostThreshold(HostDistance)
    this method has been renamed to PoolingOptions.getMaxRequestsPerConnection(HostDistance). This method calls the new one internally, but you should use the new one in your code.
    com.datastax.driver.core.PoolingOptions.getMinSimultaneousRequestsPerConnectionThreshold(HostDistance)
    this option isn't used anymore with the current pool resizing algorithm.
    com.datastax.driver.core.ProtocolOptions.getProtocolVersion()
    This is provided for backward compatibility, use ProtocolOptions.getProtocolVersionEnum() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.RegularStatement.getValues()
    This method is provided for binary compatibility only. It is no longer supported, will be removed, and simply throws UnsupportedOperationException. Use RegularStatement.getValues(ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.RegularStatement.getValues(int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use RegularStatement.getValues(ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.Host.StateListener.onSuspected(Host)
    the "suspicion" mechanism has been deprecated. This will never get called.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.serialize(Object)
    This method is provided for binary compatibility only. It is no longer supported, will be removed, and simply throws UnsupportedOperationException. Use DataType.serialize(Object, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.serialize(Object, int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use DataType.serialize(Object, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.serializeValue(Object)
    This method is provided for binary compatibility only. It is no longer supported, will be removed, and simply throws UnsupportedOperationException. Use DataType.serializeValue(Object, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.DataType.serializeValue(Object, int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use DataType.serializeValue(Object, ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.PoolingOptions.setMaxSimultaneousRequestsPerConnectionThreshold(HostDistance, int)
    this method has been renamed to PoolingOptions.setNewConnectionThreshold(HostDistance, int). This method calls the new one internally, but you should use the new one in your code.
    com.datastax.driver.core.PoolingOptions.setMaxSimultaneousRequestsPerHostThreshold(HostDistance, int)
    this method has been renamed to PoolingOptions.setMaxRequestsPerConnection(HostDistance, int). This method calls the new one internally, but you should use the new one in your code.
    com.datastax.driver.core.PoolingOptions.setMinSimultaneousRequestsPerConnectionThreshold(HostDistance, int)
    this option isn't used anymore with the current pool resizing algorithm.
    com.datastax.driver.core.Cluster.Builder.withProtocolVersion(int)
    This method is provided for backward compatibility. Use Cluster.Builder.withProtocolVersion(ProtocolVersion) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.datastax.driver.core.AbstractGettableData(int)
    This constructor is provided for backward compatibility, use AbstractGettableData.AbstractGettableData(ProtocolVersion) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.Configuration(Policies, ProtocolOptions, PoolingOptions, SocketOptions, MetricsOptions, QueryOptions)
    this constructor is provided for backward compatibility.
    com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.InvalidConfigurationInQueryException(String)
    This constructor is kept for backwards compatibility.
    com.datastax.driver.core.policies.Policies()
    this constructor is provided for backward compatibility. Use Policies.builder() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.policies.Policies(LoadBalancingPolicy, ReconnectionPolicy, RetryPolicy)
    this constructor is provided for backward compatibility. Use Policies.builder() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.policies.Policies(LoadBalancingPolicy, ReconnectionPolicy, RetryPolicy, AddressTranslater)
    this constructor is provided for backward compatibility. Use Policies.builder() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.policies.Policies(LoadBalancingPolicy, ReconnectionPolicy, RetryPolicy, AddressTranslater, SpeculativeExecutionPolicy)
    this constructor is provided for backward compatibility. Use Policies.builder() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.policies.Policies(LoadBalancingPolicy, ReconnectionPolicy, RetryPolicy, AddressTranslater, TimestampGenerator)
    this constructor is provided for backward compatibility. Use Policies.builder() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.policies.Policies(LoadBalancingPolicy, ReconnectionPolicy, RetryPolicy, AddressTranslater, TimestampGenerator, SpeculativeExecutionPolicy)
    this constructor is exposed for backward compatibility. Use Policies.builder() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.policies.Policies(LoadBalancingPolicy, ReconnectionPolicy, RetryPolicy, SpeculativeExecutionPolicy)
    this constructor is provided for backward compatibility. Use Policies.builder() instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.ProtocolOptions(int, int, SSLOptions, AuthProvider)
    This is provided for backward compatibility; use #ProtocolOptions(int, ProtocolVersion, int, SSLOptions, AuthProvider)) instead.
    com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.QueryTimeoutException(String, ConsistencyLevel, int, int)
    This constructor is kept for backwards compatibility.
    com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.QueryTimeoutException(String, Throwable, ConsistencyLevel, int, int)
    This constructor is kept for backwards compatibility.
    com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.SyntaxError(String)
    This constructor is kept for backwards compatibility.
    com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.TruncateException(String)
    This constructor is kept for backwards compatibility.
    com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.UnauthorizedException(String)
    This constructor is kept for backwards compatibility.
